summary: Drones can deliver packages, help fight fires, and provide other benefits in the United States. Demands on the Federal Aviation Administration’s staff and resources are increasing as FAA works to safely integrate drones into the nation’s airspace. The administration and Congress could choose to set user fees to help FAA recover costs. Planning and considering policy goals could help FAA inform that decision in the...
title: Unmanned Aircraft Systems: FAA Should Improve Drone-Related Cost Information and Consider Options to Recover Costs
